alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 27 at 1:47PM PDT until May 27 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory today, southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph and waves of 2 to 4 feet on Tahoe. For Saturday, west winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected and waves 2 to 4 feet on Tahoe. * WHERE...Walker, Topaz, Bridgeport, Mono, Crowley, Tahoe, Donner, Fallen Leaf, Prosser, and Boca. * WHEN...For the first Lake Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the second Lake Wind Advisory, from 11 AM to 11 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds may lead to travel restrictions for RVs, trailers, and other high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
